name: greyatom-ide
description: An integrated development environment for use with greyatom.com

notifier.title: Greyatom Status Notifications
notifier.description: Receive desktop notifications that correspond to the lights on Lgreyatom

terminalFontColor.title: Terminal Font Color
terminalFontColor.description: A valid CSS color value which will be used to style your terminal's font

terminalBackgroundColor.title: Terminal Background Color
terminalBackgroundColor.description: A valid CSS color value which will be used to style your terminal's background
